content:
summarize the content and then translate into urdu

[File Content]:
 
Assignment#1  
MTH 202 (SPRING  2025) 
Total marks: 20  
Lecture 1 -10 
Due date: MAY 18, 2025  
 
DON’T MISS these important instructions:  
• Upload assignments properly through LMS.  
• All students are directed to use the font and style of text as is used in 
this document.  
• This is an individual assignment, not group assignment, so keep in 
mind that you are supposed to submit your own and self -made 
assignment even if you discuss the ques tions with your class fellows. 
All similar assignments (even with some meaningless modifications) 
will be awarded zero marks and no excuse will be accepted. This is 
your responsibility to keep your assignment safe from others.  
• The course is segmented into   sections, each of which is supervised by 
a different faculty member. Information regarding the section 
incharge can be found in the course information section on the LMS.  
 
• A distinct assignment file has been given to each section, The relevant 
assignment  file can be downloaded from the announcement section of 
the course. It is important to note that students can only view the 
announcements relevant to their respective sections.  
 
• You will prepare the solution of assignment on Word file and upload 
at the as signment interface on LMS as per usual practice.  
 
• Plagiarism in the submitted assignment will lead to a zero grade. 
Additionally, any student who submits a solution file that is not 
relevant to his/her section will also get a zero grade.  
• Solve the assignme nt on MS word document.  
 
 
 
Question : 1                           Marks: 5 
 
Use truth tables to determine if the given argument  is valid or invalid.  
 
 
Question : 2                                                                                                           Marks: 5 
 
Use De Morgan’s Laws to find the negation of each of the following 
statements.  
(a) Jan is rich and happy . 
(b) Carlos will bicycle or run tomorrow.  
(c) Mei walks or takes the bus to class . 
(d) Ibrahim is smart and hard working.  
 
Question : 3                                                                                                           Marks: 5 
 
Find out the outputs of given digital logic circuit.  
 
  
Question : 4                                                                                                           Marks: 5 
 
Construct an algebraic proof for the given statements. Cite the 
property \definition \law\theorem used at each step.  
 
For all sets 𝐴,𝐵 and 𝐶, (𝐴−𝐵)∪(𝐵−𝐴)=(𝐴∪𝐵)−(𝐴∩𝐵)

**Summary:**

This is Assignment #1 for MTH 202 (Spring 2025), worth 20 marks, covering lectures 1-10, and due on May 18, 2025. Students must upload the assignment through LMS using the specified font and style. It is an individual assignment, and similar assignments will receive zero marks. The course is segmented, with different faculty members supervising each section. Each section has a distinct assignment file available in the announcement section of the course on LMS. Solutions should be prepared in a Word file and uploaded to the assignment interface on LMS. Plagiarism and submission of irrelevant files will result in a zero grade. The assignment includes four questions: using truth tables to determine argument validity, using De Morgan's Laws to find negations of statements, finding the outputs of a digital logic circuit, and constructing an algebraic proof.

**Translation in Urdu:**

یہ اسائنمنٹ نمبر 1 ہے MTH 202 (بہار 2025) کے لیے، جس کے 20 نمبر ہیں، لیکچر 1-10 پر محیط ہے، اور جمع کرانے کی آخری تاریخ 18 مئی 2025 ہے۔ طلباء کو ایل ایم ایس کے ذریعے مخصوص فونٹ اور انداز کا استعمال کرتے ہوئے اسائنمنٹ اپ لوڈ کرنا ہوگا۔ یہ ایک انفرادی اسائنمنٹ ہے، اور ملتی جلتی اسائنمنٹس کو صفر نمبر ملیں گے۔ کورس کو حصوں میں تقسیم کیا گیا ہے، جس میں ہر حصے کی نگرانی مختلف فیکلٹی ممبران کر رہے ہیں۔ ہر سیکشن کے لیے ایک مخصوص اسائنمنٹ فائل کورس کے اعلان والے حصے میں دستیاب ہے۔ حل کو ورڈ فائل میں تیار کیا جانا چاہیے اور ایل ایم ایس پر اسائنمنٹ انٹرفیس پر اپ لوڈ کیا جانا چاہیے۔ سرقہ بازی اور غیر متعلقہ فائلیں جمع کرانے کے نتیجے میں صفر گریڈ ملے گا۔ اسائنمنٹ میں چار سوالات شامل ہیں: دلیل کی درستی کا تعین کرنے کے لیے سچائی کے جدولوں کا استعمال، بیانات کی نفی تلاش کرنے کے لیے ڈی مورگن کے قوانین کا استعمال، ڈیجیٹل لاجک سرکٹ کے نتائج تلاش کرنا، اور الجبری ثبوت کی تعمیر۔
